sections.COMMAND AND SIGNAL:
OIC: 2LT Cammack Shepler
RSO: SSG Michael Kelley
P: TSM
A: FM
C: SIGNAL CHAT
E: RUNNER
2.
sections.MISSION: 1/2 CR executes Pistol and Shotgun Marksmanship Training on 27-28 AUG 24 on Range 131 IOT support Q4 Range Density.
sections.PURPOSE: â€“ In order to train and qualify Troopers on the M17 & M500 weapon systems.
sections.KEY TASKS:
Train Lethal Soldiers
Build Confidence in assigned weapon system
sections.END STATE:
All of the selected Troopers qualified on M17 & M500 weapon system, improving TRP/SQDN lethality. Troop Commanders and Platoon Leaders are presented with list of qualified soldiers.
3.
sections.EXECUTION:
On 27 AUG 24, Troopers move to RG 131, assemble in AA. Firers move dismounted to holding area at RG 131, receive range and safety brief and PMI, receive 9mm ammo at RG 131.
Firers conduct M17 Qualification IAW TC 3-20.40 on 27 AUG.
On 28 AUG 24, firers receive safety brief and PMI and receive 12-gauge ammo at RG 131.
Firers conduct M500 qualification IAW TC 3-22.12 on 28 AUG.
Task to Subordinate Units
HHT
Provide overall C2 support and Coordinate field rations, 1x OIC, 1x RSO, 1x medic, 1x MEV driver, 1x MEV, 4x safeties, 2x fire detail, 1x ammo NCO, 1x soldiers for ammo detail, 2x gate guards
sections.COORDINATING INSTRUCTIONS:
.
M17/M500 Range Density
M17 Table VI Qualification (TC 3-20.40)
M500 Qualification (TC 3-22.12)

draw.mission_task_and_description: Q4 RANGE DENSITY M17 & M500 QUAL

values: SAFETY BRIEF, PCC/ PCI/CHOKE POINT AT ASP
SOLDIERS WILL USE SELECTOR SWITCH DISCIPLINE AND ONLY PLACE THE WEAPON SYSTEM ON FIRE PRIOR TO ENGAGING TARGETS.
UPON COMPLETION OF EACH ENGAGEMENT, SELECTOR SWITCHES WILL BE PLACED ON SAFE.

subtasks.hazard: RICHOCHET, WEAPON ORIENTED OTHER THAN DOWNRANGE

values: FULL PPE AND BODY ARMOR WORN WHEN ON THE FIRING LINE DURING EXECUTION OF QUAL.
SOLDIERS BRIEFED REGARDING BOTH POSSIBILILITY OF RICHOCHET AND IMPORTANCE OF MAINTAINING MUZZLE DISCIPLINE.
SAFETY BRIEF, RANGE CONSTRUCTION, SPOT CHECKS
ANY SOLDIER WHO IDENTIFIES WILDLIFE ON THE RANGE DURING LIVE FIRE WILL IMMEDIETLY CALL CEASE FIRE
IMMEDIATE ACTION WILL BE PERFORMED, FOLLOWED BY REMEDIAL. AFTER REMEDIAL ACTION, LEVEL 20 ARMORERS ON-SITE WILL CHECK THE WEAPON.
SMS WILL ONLY SHOOT AT TARGETS INSIDE OF THE DESIGNATED SDZS.

subtasks.hazard: COLLISIONS WITH MILITARY OR CIVILIAN MOTOR VEHICLES

values: PARTICIPANTS WILL MOVE IN PLATOON SIZED ELEMENTS IOT MINIMIZE THE POSSIBILITY OF COLLISIONS.
EACH VEHICLE WILL HAVE AN FM RADIO AND ADHERE TO 50-100 m INTERVALS BETWEEN VEHICLES.
WILL ADHERE TO SQDN SOP REGARDING VC AND REAR GUARD AWARENESS.

draw.overall_supervision_plan: Safety brief to be conducted by RSO and will cover range orientation, procedures from ammo point to the firing line, actions on the firing line, and clearance procedures.
